Package at.htlkaindorf.entities.enemies

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
at.htlkaindorf.entities.enemies.Enemy
Direct Known Subclasses:
Walker
public abstract class Enemy
extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
The Enemy class is the parent class of all enemies. It extends the sprite class.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body body
    The body of the collectable with position, texture, ... .
    protected int reverseTimeout
    Makes sure that the enemy does not get stuck in reversing his movement.
    protected PlayScreen screen
    Playscreen on which the collectable should appear.
    protected com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 velocity
    A vector which defines the movement speed of the enemy.
    protected com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world
    World in which the collectable should appear.

      public Enemy​(PlayScreen screen, float x, float y)
      Sets the position and the bounds of the enemie and calls the define enemie method.

      x - x position of the enemie
      y - y position of the enemie

    • reverseVelocity

      public void reverseVelocity​(boolean x, boolean y)
      Sets the position and the bounds of the enemie and calls the define enemie method.
      Parameters:
      x - if true, the movement in the x direction is reversed
      y - if true, the movement in the y direction is reversed
      Since:
      1.0
